item.title: Yielding accessors in Swift nightly
item.description: Note: This post is about a work-in-progress Swift language feature â€” the code works with a nightly build of the toolchain but might not work or work differently in the future! It seems that Swift 5.6 is shaping up to a great iteration of the language and will bring a round improvements to performance-critical Swift code. I was reading through a pitch by Joe Groff on some improvements to ARC and ownership the other day when I noticed that he mentions that accessor coroutines are available in Swift trunk.
